resources.string: This little app allows you to measure approximately the distance between two points which are on the floor.

- Hold your device at eye level and aim at the point A with the cross in the middle of the screen. Then click on the first button.
 - Do the same with point B without translating your device, only rotating it.
 - Click on the third button to copy the calculated distance to the clipboard.
The tools on the top help you to figure out if your sensors are working well. If not, try a search with the keywords "android calibrate orientation sensor".
Your height H is needed to deduce the distances from the angles. The level of your eyes is approximated at 0.936 x H.
